verses.verse: And he showed <WH7200> me Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel <WH4397> of the LORD, <WH3068> and Satan <WH7854> standing <WH5975> at <WH5921> his right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> to resist <WH7853> him.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Satan, <WH7854> The LORD <WH3068> rebuke <WH1605> you, O Satan; <WH7854> even the LORD <WH3068> that has chosen <WH977> Jerusalem <WH3389> rebuke <WH1605> you: is not this <WH2088> a brand <WH181> plucked <WH5337> out of the fire? <WH784>
Now Joshua <WH3091> was clothed <WH3847> with filthy <WH6674> garments, <WH899> and stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel. <WH4397>

And he answered <WH6030> and spoke <WH559> to those that stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> him, saying, <WH559> Take <WH5493> away <WH5493> the filthy <WH6674> garments <WH899> from him. And to him he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH7200> I have caused your iniquity <WH5771> to pass <WH5674> from you, and I will clothe <WH3847> you with change <WH4254> of raiment. <WH4254>

And I said, <WH559> Let them set <WH7760> a fair <WH2889> turban <WH6797> on his head. <WH7218> So they set <WH7760> a fair <WH2889> turban <WH6797> on his head, <WH7218> and clothed <WH3847> him with garments. <WH899> And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> stood <WH5975> by.
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> protested <WH5749> to Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> If <WH518> you will walk <WH3212> in my ways, <WH1870> and if <WH518> you will keep <WH8104> my charge, <WH4931> then you shall also <WH1571> judge <WH1777> my house, <WH1004> and shall also <WH1571> keep <WH8104> my courts, <WH2691> and I will give <WH5414> you places to walk <WH4108> among <WH996> these <WH428> that stand <WH5975> by.

Hear <WH8085> now, <WH4994> O Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> you, and your fellows <WH7453> that sit <WH3427> before <WH6440> you: for they are men <WH582> wondered <WH4159> at: for, behold, <WH2005> I will bring <WH935> forth <WH935> my servant <WH5650> the BRANCH. <WH6780>

For behold <WH2009> the stone <WH68> that I have laid <WH5414> before <WH6440> Joshua; <WH3091> on one <WH259> stone <WH68> shall be seven <WH7651> eyes: <WH5869> behold, <WH2005> I will engrave <WH6605> the engraving <WH6603> thereof, said <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> and I will remove <WH4185> the iniquity <WH5771> of that land <WH776> in one <WH259> day. <WH3117>

In that day, <WH3117> said <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> shall you call <WH7121> every man his neighbor <WH7453> under <WH8478> the vine <WH1612> and under <WH8478> the fig <WH8384> tree.
